title: 4 Easy Steps to Get a YouTube Video Link on an Android

steps.title: Open the YouTube mobile app.
steps.content: Open the YouTube mobile app. It’s the red icon with a white “play” button inside. You’ll usually find it in the app drawer. You can also copy the URL in the YouTube app on your iPhone or iPad .

steps.title: Go to the YouTube video you want to share.
steps.content: Go to the YouTube video you want to share. You can browse your Home feed or tap the magnifying glass to search for a video . [1] X Research source You can also use the icons at the bottom of the screen to browse trending videos, subscriptions, and videos you’ve saved to playlists .

steps.title: Tap the Share icon.
steps.content: Tap the Share icon. It's the curved arrow below the video. A list of options will appear. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Tap Copy link.
steps.content: Tap Copy link . It’s the first icon on the Share menu. This copies the YouTube video’s URL to your Android’s clipboard, making it easy to share in text messages, emails, and social media posts. [3] X Research source To paste the URL into a document or message, long-press the typing area, then tap PASTE .
